alert.note: Alert for Hudson (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 17 at 3:28PM EST until November 18 at 8:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Hudson County. In New York, Richmond (Staten Island) County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
